post.body: aren't you glad we're on the warm side. I took my dog for 2 long walks today cuz I knew he'd enjoy it.
Have you started dating yet? You could get some cool dating duds . . . or some roofies in case in the date is going well . . . :-)
True that would be easier, but it's kinda complicated.
or you could buy porn no? . . .
Did you try SBSB? They're great. SBSB.com, great rates on health insurance and good plan choices. I've used them for years.
Actually psyched. An old college friend is coming in from LA & I just hooked up w/ a high school friend whom I loved.
Please keep me in the loop though. Next couple of weeks are crazy, after that it calms down. How are you?
It's going to be a no. We have a houseguest coming Wednesday, no washing machine, no clean clothes & DH has volleyball!
OMG, 21 day fast . . . that's amazing. I always have a really clear head when I do one. But never more than 3 days.
Same as stickk.com but their more diverse. You can do weight loss, get a degree, be a good person, etc.
I always say, "I'm living up to my hair color" (blonde) but no more! It actually works well, but now I'm owning up to foibles!
Thanks for the retweet!
I've learned from an insane relationship I'm forced to have that you can't win against people who are nuts. You can just dodge.
Not even remotely honest, I'd come up with some politically correct and slink away as soon as possible. Maybe a disease?
I just like happy people at my table enjoying themselves. I love the burble of happiness.
Thanks! will follow now.
true, am required to do mashed potatoes or my sister will just get up & leave the table. Others doing dessert so that's good.
I'll be wandering aimlessly on Tuesday. Dinner for 10 at my house on Thursday, not sure what I'm serving. Pork roast?
I'm so happy for you and hope your season is just great! I think you're proving people will buy green over junk!
Thanks for letting me know, the last time I went there it seemed stale. It was one of my favorite restaurants for a while.
I could definitely look like her if I had her $$. Actually, I'm a blonde, but you get the idea.
Am supposed to be going for checkup w/doctor but need to run to bank cuz I forgot to transfer from account A to account B. hmm, what to do?
OK, I mentioned Trader Joe's last night and now they're following me. I think it's creepy stalking for companies to do that.
Good morning all. My day doing admin is interrupted by 2 clients so I'm not expecting to accomplish a lot today. But I'm gonna try.
Gotta go read a book to the critter and tuck him in. See ya later. Busy day tomorrow.
Good Xmas party for my instructors. Everyone seemed happy with their gifts and the clean up was super easy. Trader Joe's is my caterer!
We are decorating grocery bags for wrapping paper this morning then getting ready for my Studio Xmas party, at my house, cooking begins now!
Morning all. Monty the Wonder dog is being really hyper today. Can't wait 'til we fix him. Waiting for the calm.
OK, 14 stores, 10 hours, almost done. Just one more thing to get tomorrow. Phew. Must rest now.
Any good links to an art gallery owner to explain why Twitter is worth it?
hmm, do I want to follow the Red Sox on twitter? So far down the list for season tix, it might just depress me. . .
Just watched 2 hours of Jesus documentary on Discovery channel. Feeling kinda religious. Going to bed now.
#journchat. TwitterDoIt.com, where tweeple & (tw)experts meet to reach goals little and grand! Great for New Year's Resolutions!
Signing off for now. Thanks all for a lovely afternoon/evening.
Blog post on why Organic food really is better for you. http://tinyurl.com/a38agh
http://www.twitterdoit.com/ My new Ning site that helps you set goals and meet them with peers & experts! More experts coming soon!
Wow, cool origami. Worth a click, http://tinyurl.com/9sbanf. Found when I clicked everyone.
I kinda wanna follow 9 more tweeps to get to 500. Does anyone have suggestions. Love green, style, Boston, interior design, thanks!
Pilates factoid, Charlize Theron did Pilates 6 days/week for 90 min sessions for 6 weeks to get ready for The Italian Job. I met her trainer
Interesting moment. Was taking shower and basset hound tried to join me. Not good, we both came out alive tho. :-)
